attributes.action: Waive visa requirements for Ukrainian refugees.
attributes.additional_details:
Since the beginning of 2014 the UK has offered asylum to just 30 Ukrainians, but has offered entry clearance visas to 1,261 Russian oligarchs.

The Nationality and Borders Bill will criminalise refugees who come via a third country.
attributes.background:
We MUST open our country to those fleeing Ukraine.

We call upon the government to waive visas, not just wave flags.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609382
